amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to operate or maintain more than 300 land-based intercontinental ballistic missiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 283 (Roll no. 397).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 283 (Roll no. 397).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Quigley.
